product_name: Gerber EVO Junior Fine-Edge Locking Knife
long_description: This featherweight fine-edge knife offers one-handed opening with a finger flip that doubles as a protective finger guard. Strong straight-edge blade is made of 440A stainless steel and coated with non-reflective titanium nitride for added durability. Thumb stud allows smooth, easy one-handed opening and closing; handy pocket ensures easy access. When opened, stainless-steel liner lock mechanism solidly locks blade in place. Anodized aluminum cut-out handle is lightweight yet durable.
short_description: This featherweight fine-edge knife offers one-handed opening with a finger flip that doubles as a protective finger guard.
